sheep.collision
Interface Spatial

All Known Implementing Classes:
Flat, QuadTree
public interface Spatial

Interface for all spatial partitioning structures.

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clears all sprites from the structure.
 void insert(Sprite sprite)
          Inserts a Sprite into the structure.
 void visit(SpatialVisitor visitor, BoundingBox box)
          Visits all Sprites which intersect a certain area.
 

Method Detail

insert

void insert(Sprite sprite)
Inserts a Sprite into the structure. How a Sprite is inserted is up the subclass, and may be based on information found in the Sprite, like its BoundingBox.

Parameters:
sprite - The Sprite to insert.

visit

void visit(SpatialVisitor visitor,
           BoundingBox box)
Visits all Sprites which intersect a certain area.

Parameters:
visitor - The visitor callback.
box - The BoundingBox for the area of interest.

clear

void clear()
Clears all sprites from the structure. When rebuilding the structure, it is usually more efficient to clear the elements than to reallocate the entire structure.
